subject: Programming
title: Hedy Lamarr and Frequency Hopping
description: Learn Hedy Lamarr and Frequency Hopping in one minute.

hook.text: A Hollywood actress co-invented a technology that led to WiFi, Bluetooth, and GPS.

buildup.text: Hedy Lamarr and composer George Antheil patented frequency hopping to guide torpedoes in World War II.

discovery.text: Their idea spread radio signals across rapidly changing frequencies, making them impossible to jam.

twist.text: The Navy ignored her patent during the war. Decades later, the military adopted it without credit.

climax.text: Spread spectrum technology became the foundation of modern wireless communication.

punchline.text: A movie star's invention connects us all.

quiz.question: What technology did Hedy Lamarr co-invent?
